author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sri Venkateshwaraa Medical College Hospital and Research Centre: Inauguration of Super Speciality Out Patient Block, Hospital Block, Annex Building (Ground Floor), Puducherry-Villupuram Road, Ariyur, 10 a.m.

World Diabetes Day Foundation, JIPMER: Awareness Programme on Diabetes, Hypertension, Obesity and Strike, Thanthai Periyar Government Girls Higher Secondeary School, Manaveli, Ariyankuppam, 2 p.m.

Commercial Taxes Department: Inauguration of Puducherry Traders’ Welfare Board, Conference Hall, Commercial Taxes Department, Ellaipillaichavady, 4 p.m.

Department of Animal Husbandry and Animal Welfare Department: Foundation stone laying ceremony for new branch of Key Village Centre, Murungapakkam, 10 a.m.
title: 16FEBPYSSM02 ENGAGEMENT
